charges.charge_description: 21:846 - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE OVER 280 GRAMS - COCAINE BASE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 262 months; followed by 5 years of supervised release with special conditions; $100.00 Special Assessment.

charges.charge_description: 21:846 - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE OVER 280 GRAMS - COCAINE BASE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of two hundred sixty-two (262) months, said term to run concurrent with state sentence that has been imposed; followed by 5 years of supervised release; $100.00 Special Assessment.
